issue.title: When is ROS bag recorder ready?

content.raw:
The ros bag recorder starts with the communication bridge. There is no mechanism to know exactly when the rosbag process starts recording to disk, but the delay between when your solution starts and when the rosbag process starts should be minimal to non existent.

Can you point me to a specific cloudsim instance that did not contain the beginning? 

Keep in mind that any data recorded past the 2GB boundary will overwrite your first bagfile.
content.html:
The ros bag recorder starts with the communication bridge. There is no mechanism to know exactly when the rosbag process starts recording to disk, but the delay between when your solution starts and when the rosbag process starts should be minimal to non existent.

Can you point me to a specific cloudsim instance that did not contain the beginning?

Keep in mind that any data recorded past the 2GB boundary will overwrite your first bagfile.
